parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
